messages.title: FOR A BRIGHTER FUTURE:
messages.content: A vote for Sue Wixley is a vote against Brexit. Sue is a Human Rights and Charity Campaigner. Vote Sue to stop Conservative cuts to our services and hospitals.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Britain needs fresh vision and leadership to restore fairness in our country. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the stock markets.
The Liberal Democrats will take the urgent action needed to protect our environment, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green jobs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: INVEST IN SCHOOLS AND OUR NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: As Prime Minister, Jo Swinson will work every day to ensure our children get the world-class education they deserve and that the best doctors will continue working for the NHS after years of Conservative cuts.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Lib Dem vote surges: Remainers from both Labour and the Conservatives are flocking to the Liberal Democrats in large numbers - Labour cannot win here.

issues.brexitEurope: Vote for Sue Wixley is a vote against Brexit. Labour can't win here.
issues.economy: The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the stock markets.
issues.education: Liberal Democrats will ensure our children get the world-class education they deserve.
issues.environment: The Liberal Democrats will take the urgent action needed to protect our environment, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green jobs.
issues.health: Liberal Democrats will take action to reverse Conservative cuts and invest in our NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: Sue is a Human Rights and Charity Campaigner.

images.caption: Sue Wixley: A strong voice for Putney
